mapper.insert: insert into R_REPORT ( S_SCORE_NO, R_REPORT_NO ) values ( S_SCORE_SEQ.currval, R_REPORT_SEQ.nextval )
mapper.select: select R_TITLE as reportTitle, R_DEADLINE as reportDeadline, R_REGDATE as reportDate, R_PUBLIC as reportPublic, R_SCORE as reportScore, S_SCORE_NO as scoreNo, R_REPORT_NO as reportNo from R_REPORT where S_SCORE_NO = #{sno}
